findings.Description: S3 bucket versioning should be enabled to help recover from both unintended user actions and application failures.
Types: Software and Configuration Checks/Industry and Regulatory Standards/AWS-Foundational-Security-Best-Practices
findings.Title: S3 bucket versioning is not enabled

findings.Description: ALB should be configured to drop HTTP headers with invalid header fields.
Types: Software and Configuration Checks/Industry and Regulatory Standards/AWS-Foundational-Security-Best-Practices
findings.Title: Application Load Balancer is not configured to drop invalid headers
